title: My New Cookbook: Easy Everyday!!

author: Jessica
excerpt: Surprise! You can order my newest cookbook today! I am so excited to tell you about Easy Everyday, my next book. It is packed with over 100 fantastic recipes, from breakfast to dinner to snacks to treats to mocktails and more. That’s right – it’s just like Everyday Dinners, but this time, I’m giving you […]
text: Surprise! You can order my newest cookbook today! I am so excited to tell you about Easy Everyday, my next book. It is packed with over 100 fantastic recipes, from breakfast to dinner to snacks to treats to mocktails and more. That’s right – it’s just like Everyday Dinners, but this time, I’m giving you more than just dinner! It’s an extension of Everyday Dinners… we have simple and flavorful dishes for every time time of day, some entertaining snacks, another one (!) of my signature sauces & dressings chapters (the fridge essentials that elevate everything!), so many tips for how I get meals prepped and ready for the week along with a lot of our family favorites. Think: so many of my (new!) signature salads that you guys go wild over. Breakfasts that have staying power. Make-ahead lunches! Dinners you will crave. Snacks that are easy to prep and serve to friends. Desserts that are dreamy! Boozy and non-alcoholic options to share. IT’S MEAL TIME GOLD! Easy Everyday will officially be out on April 15th of this year. It will be here before you know it! Inside, you will find: Over 100+ effortless recipes for everyday life. An assortment of all sorts of recipes, many of them meatless and vegetarian. My 10-minute meal prep strategy for EVERY recipe. My pantry and fridge essentials, aka the recipes I can’t live without. They change the game for easy meals. My tips and tricks for how to get a meal on the table for your family, consistently and in an enjoyable way, without stress! Low-maintenance, uncomplicated dishes! All my usual ramblings and of course, photos for everything. Woohoo! Where To Buy Amazon Barnes & Noble Bookshop.org Books A Million Target Hudson Booksellers Apple Ebook Google Play Ebook  To say I AM SO FREAKING EXCITED ABOUT THIS BOOK would be an understatement. I mean, seriously cue all the exclamation points. It is SUPERB! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! My recipe brain works overtime and I always want to make sure I’m coming up with the best ideas for you guys, testing them thoroughly and sharing them in a way that is easy and approachable for you to enjoy. This book is just that. I think you are going to love it! I created all of these recipes in 2021 and 2022 and it has been quite simply agonizing having to wait to tell you about so many of them. They are just SO delicious. And there have been so many times that I *almost* told you about the snack cake or the easy pasta dish or the salad I can’t get enough of. But I’ve had to zip my lips! Even though spilling the beans is my middle name, I’ve kept quiet on a lot of the goodness in here. By now, you know the drill. This is my fourth book but it doesn’t get any easier asking you to please preorder! So here it goes: It would mean THE WORLD to me if you would preorder the book. This gives us so much info – like where the book can be sold, where I can go on my book tour, what fun events we can hold and more! It also shows retailers and publishers that you guys are excited for the book. And I so hope that you are! I’d be honored and so appreciate if you would order from your favorite bookseller. Amazon / Barnes & Noble / Bookshop.org / Books A Million Target / Hudson Booksellers / Apple Ebook / Google Play Ebook  Per usual, you’ll get to enjoy so many of my favorite classics with a modern twist in Easy Everyday. And I can’t wait for us to chat all about it!
html:
Surprise!

You can order my newest cookbook today!

I am so excited to tell you about Easy Everyday, my next book. It is packed with over 100 fantastic recipes, from breakfast to dinner to snacks to treats to mocktails and more. That’s right – it’s just like Everyday Dinners, but this time, I’m giving you more than just dinner! It’s an extension of Everyday Dinners… we have simple and flavorful dishes for every time time of day, some entertaining snacks, another one (!) of my signature sauces & dressings chapters (the fridge essentials that elevate everything!), so many tips for how I get meals prepped and ready for the week along with a lot of our family favorites.

Think: so many of my (new!) signature salads that you guys go wild over. Breakfasts that have staying power. Make-ahead lunches! Dinners you will crave. Snacks that are easy to prep and serve to friends. Desserts that are dreamy! Boozy and non-alcoholic options to share. IT’S MEAL TIME GOLD!

Easy Everyday will officially be out on April 15th of this year. It will be here before you know it!

Inside, you will find:

  • Over 100+ effortless recipes for everyday life.
  • An assortment of all sorts of recipes, many of them meatless and vegetarian.
  • My 10-minute meal prep strategy for EVERY recipe.
  • My pantry and fridge essentials, aka the recipes I can’t live without. They change the game for easy meals.
  • My tips and tricks for how to get a meal on the table for your family, consistently and in an enjoyable way, without stress!
  • Low-maintenance, uncomplicated dishes!
  • All my usual ramblings and of course, photos for everything. Woohoo!

Where To Buy

Amazon

Barnes & Noble

Bookshop.org

Books A Million

Target

Hudson Booksellers

Apple Ebook

Google Play Ebook 

To say I AM SO FREAKING EXCITED ABOUT THIS BOOK would be an understatement. I mean, seriously cue all the exclamation points. It is SUPERB!

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

My recipe brain works overtime and I always want to make sure I’m coming up with the best ideas for you guys, testing them thoroughly and sharing them in a way that is easy and approachable for you to enjoy. This book is just that. I think you are going to love it!

I created all of these recipes in 2021 and 2022 and it has been quite simply agonizing having to wait to tell you about so many of them. They are just SO delicious. And there have been so many times that I *almost* told you about the snack cake or the easy pasta dish or the salad I can’t get enough of. But I’ve had to zip my lips! Even though spilling the beans is my middle name, I’ve kept quiet on a lot of the goodness in here.

By now, you know the drill. This is my fourth book but it doesn’t get any easier asking you to please preorder! So here it goes: It would mean THE WORLD to me if you would preorder the book. This gives us so much info – like where the book can be sold, where I can go on my book tour, what fun events we can hold and more! It also shows retailers and publishers that you guys are excited for the book. And I so hope that you are! I’d be honored and so appreciate if you would order from your favorite bookseller.

Amazon / Barnes & Noble / Bookshop.org / Books A Million

Target / Hudson Booksellers / Apple Ebook / Google Play Ebook 

Per usual, you’ll get to enjoy so many of my favorite classics with a modern twist in Easy Everyday. And I can’t wait for us to chat all about it!
